name: SCHOOL SIMULATOR MULTIPLAYER
description: Make you feel good in the school! Try what would it be like if you could do anything in the school break. Crush! Don’t kid yourself. Break out from the roll of eager beaver! You don’t have to worry about thing, just do it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2+ GHZ Dual Core or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
